ValidationRule.description: Ensures UnitedHealthcare plan sponsor is Nielsen, Nielsen-HDHP, Acushnet, Fogo de Chao or Fogo de Chao-HDHP
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c, "UnitedHealthcare"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Nielsen", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Nielsen-HDHP", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Acushnet", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Fogo de Chao", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Fogo de Chao-HDHP")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Group/Plan Sponsor must be Nielsen, Nielsen-HDHP, Acushnet, Fogo de Chao or Fogo de Chao-HDHP
